maintainer.name: Gentoo network monitoring and analysis project

pkgmetadata.longdescription:
tcptrace is a TCP connection analysis tool. It can tell you detailed information about TCP connections by sifting through dump files.
The dump file formats supported are: * Standard tcpdump format (you need the pcap library) * Sun's snoop format * Macintosh Etherpeek format * HP/NetMetrix protocol analysis format * NS simulator output format * NetScout * NLANR Tsh Format
To see the graphs, you'll also need Tim Shepard's xplot program, available at http://www.xplot.org
